desc: Handmade eco silver jewellery by KlaarSmithDesign. I design and make all silver jewellery myself at my workshop based in Wimbledon, UK. Unique silver pieces to wear every day or for special occasions. Perfect meaningful gift for yourself or a loved that will help create lasting memories. Sustainability is key.

layout.text: Timeless and unique sustainable silver jewellery for precious moments and memories, for you and the special people in your life.
